Key Match Events: Bulgaria scored their first goal in the 40th minute by Kiril Despodov, assisted by Aleksandar Kolev.
Northern Ireland made several substitutions starting from the 59th minute onwards.
Bulgaria substituted multiple players starting from the 61st minute onwards.
The match ended with a final score of 1-0 in favor of Bulgaria.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Hristo Botev Stadium in Plovdiv, Bulgaria.
